webDevelopment.name: Web Design & Development Services
webDevelopment.description: Our web design packages are designed to be fully custom, responsive, and include essential on-page SEO so that your site not only looks professional but also converts visitors into clients.

categories.name: Website Packages
categories.description: Complete website design and development packages.

services.name: Single Page Website ⭐ MOST POPULAR
services.description: Perfect for small businesses! Professional single-page website with modern design, mobile responsive, contact form, and basic SEO. Great for showcasing your business essentials.

services.name: Basic Website Package
services.description: Up to 5 custom-designed pages (Home, About, Services/Products, Contact, etc.), responsive design, basic SEO integration and contact form

services.name: Standard Business Website
services.description: 6–10 pages, custom design with a CMS (e.g. WordPress) for easy updates, integration of social media links, basic blog setup, and enhanced SEO

services.name: Corporate/Custom Website
services.description: Up to 20 pages with advanced features (custom functionality, higher-level SEO, multimedia integration)

services.name: E-commerce Website
services.description: Up to 30 pages, integrated payment gateway, product catalog, and shopping cart
